Patients biopsy-proven Class III/IV+/-V LN randomize receive : 1 ) prednisolone ( 0.8mg/kg/day ) plus CTX ( 1.5-2mg/kg/d ) 6 month ) follow Azathioprine ( AZA ) ( 1-1.5mg/kg/d ) maintenance ; OR 2 ) prednisolone ( 0.8mg/kg/d ) plus MMF ( 1g bd ) 6 month , follow MMF ( taper accord clinical status ) maintenance . The lymphocyte subset serum cytokine profile measure 4- , 12- , 24- , 36- 48 week induction treatment . The lymphocyte subset serum cytokine profile compare two treatment regimen , also correlate subsequent risk relapse .
